title: Code Red (Russian group)
text:
Code Red is a German-Russian dance and house music group currently consisting of Maria Baimler. Past members were Mauro Sharcev and Marc Staudinger. The band is possibly disbanded in early 2010.


== Discography ==


=== Studio albums ===
Party Code - June 20, 2008 (Poland) / July 14, 2008 (Czech Republic)


=== Singles ===
2007 – "Kanikuly"
2008 – "18"
2008 – "Shut Up"
2008 – "Too Sexy"
2008 – "Hot Hot Hot"
2009 – "My Angel"
2009 – "Bang Bang"
2012 - "Sweat"
